title: An experimental and response-surface-based optimization approach towards production of producer gas in a circulating fluidized bed gasifier using blends of renewable fibre-based biomass mixtures
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,975-986
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE00551H, Paper
Chokkalingam Viswakethu, Ramanathan Pichappan, Prakash Perumal, Natrayan Lakshmaiya
Effects of process parameters on the energy efficiency of biomass gasification are examined. The highest energy efficiency is observed for a blend of biomass and air as a gasifying medium.
